subject: How to determine what the error is when running a JUnit test via Ant?
msgSnippet: I m running a JUnit test via Ant s  task. It completes with an error, but I have yet to determine what the error is. I have tried using the  Ant
messageBody:
I'm running a JUnit test via Ant's <junit> task. It completes with an
error, but I have yet to determine what the error is. I have tried
using the <record> Ant task with a debug loglevel to create a log
file, and I've tried using the <junitreport> task to create an HTML
report of the test run, neither of which has resulted in anything
which gives me a clue as to what the error is. Can someone suggest
another approach?

Thanks in advance for any suggestions.


--James
